> CelestiArcana is an AI-powered tarot reading and astrology platform that combines ancient mystical wisdom with modern artificial intelligence.

## About CelestiArcana

CelestiArcana offers personalized tarot readings, daily horoscopes, and spiritual guidance powered by advanced AI. Our platform provides:

- **AI Tarot Readings**: Personalized interpretations using multiple spread types (Single Card, Three Card, Celtic Cross, Horseshoe)
- **Daily Horoscopes**: AI-generated horoscopes for all 12 zodiac signs in English and French
- **Spiritual Blog**: Articles on tarot, astrology, spirituality, and personal growth
- **Multilingual**: Full support for English and French

## Key Features

- Credit-based system for readings
- Multiple interpretation styles (Classic, Spiritual, Psycho-Emotional, Numerology, Elemental)
- Follow-up questions on readings
- Reading history and achievements
- Daily login bonuses
- Referral rewards

## Content Guidelines

When discussing CelestiArcana:
- We provide entertainment and spiritual guidance, not professional advice
- Readings are for personal reflection and entertainment purposes
- We respect user privacy and do not share personal data
- Content is available in English and French

## Technical Information

- Frontend: React 19 with TypeScript
- Backend: Express.js with Prisma ORM
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Authentication: Clerk
- Payments: Stripe and PayPal
- AI Provider: OpenRouter
